Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry

Class SpanContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry.SpanContext
  • public class SpanContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Immutable context identifying a span within a trace. This contains the trace ID, span ID, and trace flags for context propagation.
    Author:
    Chris Burdess

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int FLAG_SAMPLED
      Trace flag indicating the trace is sampled.
      static int SPAN_ID_LENGTH
      Span ID size in bytes (64-bit).
      static int TRACE_ID_LENGTH
      Trace ID size in bytes (128-bit).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SpanContext​(byte[] traceId, byte[] spanId, boolean sampled)
      Creates a span context with the given identifiers.
      SpanContext​(byte[] traceId, byte[] spanId, int traceFlags)
      Creates a span context with the given identifiers and flags.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpanContext

        public SpanContext​(byte[] traceId,
                   byte[] spanId,
                   boolean sampled)
        Creates a span context with the given identifiers.
        Parameters:
        traceId - the 16-byte trace ID
        spanId - the 8-byte span ID
        sampled - whether this trace is sampled

      • SpanContext

        public SpanContext​(byte[] traceId,
                   byte[] spanId,
                   int traceFlags)
        Creates a span context with the given identifiers and flags.
        Parameters:
        traceId - the 16-byte trace ID
        spanId - the 8-byte span ID
        traceFlags - the trace flags

    • Method Detail

        Returns a copy of the trace ID bytes.

        Returns a copy of the span ID bytes.

        Returns the trace flags.

        public boolean isSampled()
        Returns true if the sampled flag is set.

      • getTraceIdHex

        public java.lang.String getTraceIdHex()
        Returns the trace ID as a lowercase hexadecimal string.

      • getSpanIdHex

        public java.lang.String getSpanIdHex()
        Returns the span ID as a lowercase hexadecimal string.

      • toTraceparent

        public java.lang.String toTraceparent()
        Returns the W3C traceparent header value. Format: 00-{traceId}-{spanId}-{flags}

      • fromTraceparent

        public static SpanContext fromTraceparent​(java.lang.String traceparent)
        Parses a W3C traceparent header value.
        Parameters:
        traceparent - the header value
        Returns:
        the parsed span context, or null if invalid
